; Custom campaign script generated by Romans Campaign Map Editor

campaign		imperial_campaign
playable
	romans_julii
	romans_brutii
	romans_scipii
end
unlockable
	egypt
	seleucid
	carthage
	parthia
	gauls
	germans
	britons
	greek_cities
	macedon
	pontus
	armenia
	dacia
	numidia
	scythia
	spain
	thrace
end
nonplayable
	romans_senate
	slave
end


start_date	-270 summer
end_date	14 summer

brigand_spawn_value 10
pirate_spawn_value 28

superfaction romans_senate
denari	5000
settlement
{
	level large_town
	region Etruria

	year_founded 0
	population 4000
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator romans_julii
	building
	{
		type barracks militia_barracks
	}
	building
	{
		type core_building governors_villa
	}
	building
	{
		type port_buildings port
	}
	building
	{
		type defenses wooden_pallisade
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_farms farms
	}
	building
	{
		type hinterland_roads roads
	}
}

faction	romans_senate, comfortable_napoleon
denari	5000
settlement
{
	level city
	region Latium

	year_founded 0
	population 7500
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator romans_julii
	building
	{
		type core_building governors_palace
	}
	building
	{
		type defenses stone_wall
	}
	building
	{

	}

settlement
{
	level town
	region Lycia

	year_founded 0
	population 1200
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator macedon
	building
	{
		type core_building governors_house
	}
	building
	{
		type defenses wooden_pallisade
	}
}

{
	level town
	region Regnum_Palmyrae

	year_founded 0
	population 1200
	plan_set default_set
	faction_creator parthia
	building
	{
		type core_building governors_house
	}
	building
	{
		type defenses wooden_pallisade
	}
	building
	{
		type market trader
	}
	building
	{
		type barracks muster_field
	}
}

; >>>> start of diplomacy section <<<<

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; >>>> start of diplomacy section <<<<
;DS_ALLIED			= 0
;DS_SUSPICIOUS		= 100
;DS_NEUTRAL			= 200
;DS_HOSTILE			= 400
;DS_AT_WAR			= 600

core_attitudes	romans_julii,	-10		romans_brutii, romans_scipii, romans_senate
core_attitudes	romans_julii,	400		carthage
core_attitudes	romans_julii,	600		slave
core_attitudes	romans_brutii,	-10		romans_julii, romans_scipii, romans_senate
core_attitudes	romans_brutii,	600		slave
core_attitudes	romans_scipii,	-10		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_senate
core_attitudes	romans_scipii,	600		slave
core_attitudes	romans_senate, 	-10		romans_julii, romans_brutii, romans_scipii
core_attitudes	romans_senate,	600		slave
core_attitudes	macedon,		90		romans_brutii
core_attitudes	macedon,		600		slave
core_attitudes	egypt,		410		numidia
core_attitudes	egypt,		600		slave
core_attitudes	seleucid,		410		parthia
core_attitudes	seleucid,		600		slave
core_attitudes	carthage,		310		romans_julii, romans_scipii
core_attitudes	carthage,		90		numidia

core_attitudes	carthage,		600		slave
core_attitudes	parthia,		90		armenia
core_attitudes	parthia,		600		slave

core_attitudes	spain,		600		slave

core_attitudes	thrace,		300		dacia
core_attitudes	thrace,		600		slave

faction_relationships	romans_julii,		100		romans_brutii
faction_relationships	romans_julii, 		100		romans_scipii

;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
; >>>> start of regions section <<<<

;;new superfaction definition
superfaction_setup romans_senate

;;defines who this superfaction will be hostile to by default
default_hostile slave
;;don't like the factions we're supposed to have our minions attack
default_hostile gauls
default_hostile greek_cities
default_hostile carthage

;;mission queues, allows you to give factions a specific track of missions
;;the mission must ALWAYS be preceeded by the reward or penalty for completing the mission and the amount of turns the player should be given to complete that mission

;;reward/penalty types:
;;outlaw
;;censor_investigates_family
;;censor_investigates_faction
;;quaestor_investigates_for_corruption
;;quaestor_investigates_for_financial_irregularities
;;quaestor_investigates_for_accounting_irregularities
;;senate_displeasure
;;secret_information_exposure
;;offices_witheld
;;major_exotic_unit
;;two_minor_exotic_units
;;two_best_buildable_units
;;one_best_buildable_unit
;;one_minor_exotic_unit
;;one_buildable_unit
;;major_reward
;;moderate_reward
;;minor_reward
;;promise_of_appointment
;;senate_gratitude
;;throw_games
;;one_triarii
;;two_triarii

;;mission types:
;; Help_Player
;; Demand_Suicide
;; Blockade_Port <settlement>
;; Assassinate <character name>
;; Exact_Tribute <faction name>
;; Subjugate <faction name>
;; Get_Map_Info <faction name>
;; Make_Trade_Agreement <faction name>
;; Declare_War <faction name>
;; Take_City <settlement>

;;julii first mission should be to capture segesta
mission_queue romans_julii
{
	major_reward 10 Take_City Segesta
	;;two_triarii 10 Take_City Mediolanum
	;;major_reward 10 Take_City Caralis
}
;;brutii first mission should be to capture Apollonia
mission_queue romans_brutii
{
	major_reward 10 Take_City Apollonia
	;;senate_gratitude 10 Get_Map_Info macedon
}
;;scipii first mission should be to capture Syracuse
mission_queue romans_scipii
{
	major_reward 10 Take_City Syracuse
	;;one_minor_exotic_unit 10 Declare_War carthage
	;;two_triarii 10 Take_City Lilybaeum
	;;senate_gratitude 10 Blockade_Port Carthage
	;;two_minor_exotic_units 10 Take_City Byzacium
	;;throw_games 10 Take_City Carthage
}

script
tutorial.txt, once_only
